title: University Center of Lake County | University Center Partnerships | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Transfer Student Prepare to Transfer Transferring Your Courses Meet Your Transfer Counselor DePaul Admission Partnership Program University Center PartnershipsUniversity Center at Harper CollegeUniversity Center of Lake County University Center at Harper College University Center of Lake County For Advisors Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Types of Admission>Transfer Student>University Center Partnerships>University Center of Lake County University Center of Lake County DePaul – College of Lake County Earn a degree from DePaul at the University Center of Lake County DePaul is pleased to partner with the University Center of Lake County. With this partnership, you can complete your associate’s degree at the College of Lake County and then move directly into DePaul’s bachelor’s degree completion program in business administration. Or, enroll in DePaul’s master’s entry to nursing practice (MENP) and prepare for a career in the medical field—all without leaving Lake County. Contact usRegister for an eventApply Your Tuition Discount DePaul is committed to making your degree affordable. University Center students majoring in Business Administration will automatically receive a discounted rate that’s 25% lower than the undergraduate, part-timetuition rate. Depending on the number of credits you need to complete your degree, you could save as much as $16,000 in tuition. DePaul Cohort Program You and your classmates will solve problems and build relationships—together. Learn more Degree Programs We offer customized degree programs, tailored to your academic interests and intended career path. Explore programs Upcoming Events Want to know more about the cohort program? Attend one of our upcoming events. Register for an event Learn more Want to learn more about DePaul programs offered at the University Center of Lake County? Request more information. Ready to Get Started?
